EmailTemplate.name: UserGroups_2012.Reminder2
EmailTemplate.subject: 2012 Spring User Group Meetings - It's not too late to register!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2012 Spring User Group Meetings The TriTech Spring User Group Meetings are about to get underway. It's not too late to register! Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Local user group meetings are your chance to see what is coming from a product standpoint and hear what is going on at TriTech. If you have comments or concerns, this is your chance to address them to the management team.
REGISTER NOW Please copy and paste this link into a web browser: http://offers.tritech.com/UserGroups_2012_Register.html
We hope to see you there,
Phil Sisk Vice President of Operations TriTech Software Systems | North Grafton, MA
Leo Hisoire Senior Product Manager TriTech Software Systems | North Grafton, MA
